meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of theism.
meanings.sent1: The theistical beliefs of the community were evident in their daily rituals.
meanings.sent2: She had a theistical outlook on life, finding comfort in the idea of a higher power.
meanings.sent3: The theistical debate at the dinner table led to an unexpected agreement.
meanings.sent4: His theistical perspective painted the world in hues of divine guidance.
meanings.sent5: The theistical nature of the sunrise filled her with a sense of wonder.

meanings.definition: Believing in the existence of a god or gods.
meanings.sent1: Their theistical views shaped their moral compass.
meanings.sent2: The theistical community gathered to celebrate the festival.
meanings.sent3: The theistical cat seemed to purr a prayer of thanks.
meanings.sent4: His theistical faith was a beacon of hope in times of darkness.
meanings.sent5: The theistical presence in the ancient ruins was palpable.
